TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BotFrameworkConfig extends Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Dialog.DialogServiceConfig
Public NotInheritable Class BotFrameworkConfig Inherits DialogServiceConfig

Docs.summary: Contains configurations for the dialog service connector object for using a Bot Framework backend.
Docs.remarks: See also: [Quickstart: Create a Voice Assistant with the Speech SDK in C# UWP](https://github.com/Azure-Samples/cognitive-services-speech-sdk/tree/master/quickstart/csharp/uwp/virtual-assistant)

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Dialog.BotFrameworkConfig FromAuthorizationToken (string authorizationToken, string region, string botId = "");
.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Dialog.BotFrameworkConfig FromAuthorizationToken(string authorizationToken, string region, string botId) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromAuthorizationToken (authorizationToken As String, region As String, Optional botId As String = "") As BotFrameworkConfig
static member FromAuthorizationToken : string * string * string -> Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Dialog.BotFrameworkConfig

Docs.param: The authorization token associated with the bot
Region identifier for the authorization token associated with the bot
The optional bot ID (aka bot secret) used to select a bot associated with the given subscription
Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the bot framework config with the specified authorization token and region. Note: The caller needs to ensure that the authorization token is valid. Before the authorization token expires, the caller needs to refresh it by calling this setter with a new valid token. As configuration values are copied when creating a new recognizer, the new token value will not apply to recognizers that have already been created. For recognizers that have been created before, you need to set authorization token of the corresponding recognizer to refresh the token. Otherwise, the recognizers will encounter errors during recognition.
